Remarks / record (e.g., test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Base of excavation and extents of pits/culverts pinned and checked to be correct line and level per IFC drawings.
Acceptance criteria - Confirm correct concrete mix in use prior to commencement of pour
Acceptance criteria - Reinforcement installed as per IFC Drawings and Specifications.

Acceptance criteria - Formwork installed in accordance with IFC drawings to correct dimensions.
Remarks / record (e.g., test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Construction joints to be installed in accordance with Civil Drawings and notes using correct materials.
Acceptance criteria - Check Correct Mix supplied?
○ Concrete shall be transported, handled and placed to prevent segregation, loss or leakage of materials.
○ Concrete to be tamped/vibrated to increase density and prevent voids, honeycombing or surface defects.
Remarks / record (e.g., test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Samples to be taken from chute at a frequency of 1 test per 50m3.
○ Each sample shall consist of two cylinder specimens for 28 day testing. Number of samples to be taken from Table 503.051.
Remarks / record (e.g., test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) -
Acceptance criteria - Confirm finish is in accordance with IFC Drawings and specification.
Acceptance criteria - Do not cover or conceal work until it has been inspected by Symal.
Acceptance criteria - Confirm specified compressive strength has been achieved
Acceptance criteria - As-built survey of work lot attached.
